page.title: 20LOCAL JOURNALS AND SLIDES
page.content: There are in existence two volumes of a journal and a series of lantern slides illustrating village buildings, streets, people and events in Runcton, North Mundham and Hunston during the first half of the 20th. Century, with some reference to life before and after this period. The slides were collected by the Rev'd E.P.A.C. Outram during the period 1919-1971, most of the slides being made by him from photographs he and his parishioners had taken. A special part of the collection was made during the 1951 Festival of Britain Year, the vicar being helped in this task by the amateur photographers of the parish. The documents and slides provide a valuable insight to the social history of the area.
